About Us

We are a group of engineering students from JSPM’s Rajarshi Shahu College Of Engineering, Pune, who are passionate about research and design projects. Team Redline Racing was conceived in the year 2014 when a few aspirated colleagues decided to go beyond classroom learning and create something by applying theory into practice.
